title: Lili Reinhart and Cole Sprouse pack on PDA during a date in LA after brief 'split' earlier this year
text:
They went through a brief 'split' back in July.

But Cole Sprouse and Lili Reinhart proved they were very much back on as the couple was spotted enjoying a romantic dinner on Friday night in Echo Park, Los Angeles.

The love-birds dressed casually and packed on the PDA outside the restaurant, with Cole embracing his lady love while leaving the restaurant.

Scroll down for video

Loved up: Lili Reinhart and Cole Sprouse were seen packing on the PDA during a casual dinner date on Friday night in Los Angeles

Lili rocked a white zip up hoodie and wore a matching tank top underneath for the casual date.

She teamed the look with a pair of mid-wash mom jeans and chunky black boots.

And while the Riverdale star dressed casually, her hair and makeup was all done up - following her appearance at the Tiffany & Co event in Hollywood earlier in the evening.

Casual: Lili rocked a white zip up hoodie underneath a tank top for the date

No stress look: Cole rocked a similar ensemble featuring a tan colored jacket over the top of his white T-shirt and jeans

Lili's hair featured a high voluminous crown before being styled out into a braid.

Her makeup was kept dewy with a sweep of blush and a bold cat-eye.

Cole rocked a similar ensemble featuring a tan colored jacket over the top of his white T-shirt and jeans.

Lili confirmed that they were back on in September when she called Cole her 'boyfriend' during an interview with Covetur.

Big night: Earlier in the evening, Lili was seen at the Tiffany & Co event in Hollywood

Speaking about Halloween, she said she was planning on doing a matching ensemble with the fellow Riverdale star.

'I think I’m leaning in towards a character for Halloween,' she said.

'I think I’m going to do it with my boyfriend, Cole. I don’t want to spoil it if it’s not going to happen, but it’s a TV duo.'

Over: Lili and Cole briefly split in July (pictured) after two years, according to reports

Cole and Lili reportedly split for a short time back in July after two years of dating.

'Their friends didn't really expect them to last in the long-run,' a source told People at the time.

'At the end of the day, their personalities are very different and their lifestyles often clashed. Things have felt super heavy in the relationship for a while, and it got to be too much. They're both very professional though and trying to be as amicable and friendly as possible.'

They play love interests Betty Cooper and Jughead Jones on the CW’s take on the Archie comics, Riverdale.
